title: Evaluate an Early Lease Termination Request
description: A commercial tenant wants to terminate their lease early. The landlord's agent must evaluate the request and its financial impact.

tasks.description: Review the tenant's lease to understand the penalties and clauses related to early termination.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the financial obligations of the tenant for early termination.

tasks.description: Calculate the total cost of the termination fee, which may include unamortized leasing commissions and tenant improvements.
tasks.expected_outcome: A precise termination fee is calculated.

tasks.description: Present the buyout calculation to the tenant and negotiate the final termination agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: A lease termination agreement is executed, and the tenant pays the agreed-upon fee.
